name: Gumroad
title: gumroad.com
shortDescription: Gumroad simplifies online selling for creators and artists. It allows users to sell a variety of products such as ebooks, software, and art. An example use case is an artist selling digital brushes, transitioning from a side gig to a primary income source, as seen with MaxPacks. Gumroad supports various payment models and integrates with numerous apps via Zapier.
pros: No tech expertise required to start
cons: May not scale well for large businesses

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Sellfy
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Strong in digital goods and print on demand
